com.dragonboatrace.tools

Class Lane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dragonboatrace.tools.Lane

  • public class Lane
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Lane in a Race.
    Author:
    Benji Garment, Joe Wrieden, William Walton

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Lane(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos, int width, int round, int difficulty)
      Creates a new lane at a position and with a width and uses the round number to change the number of obstacles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Remove an Obstacle from the list of obstacles, and randomly replace it.

      Create a random time at which to add an Obstacle to the lane.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lane

        public Lane(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos,
            int width,
            int round,
            int difficulty)
        Creates a new lane at a position and with a width and uses the round number to change the number of obstacles.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the lane in the screen.
        width - The width of the lane.
        round - The current round, used to increase difficulty.
        difficulty - The difficulty of the game

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float deltaTime,
                   float velY)
        Update the obstacles in the lane, remove any that are no longer on screen and replace them at a random time.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time since the last frame.
        velY - The y-velocity of the boat in the lane.

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Render the obstacles in the lane.
        Parameters:
        batch - The SpriteBatch to be added to.

      • getObstacles

        public java.util.List<Obstacle> getObstacles()
        Get the list of all obstacles in the lane.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of type Obstacle with all the obstacles in the lane.

      • getHitbox

        public Hitbox getHitbox()
        Get the lanes hit box
        Returns:
        A Hitbox representing the lanes area.

      • removeObstacle

        public void removeObstacle(Obstacle toRemove)
        Remove an Obstacle from the list of obstacles, and randomly replace it.
        Parameters:
        toRemove - The obstacle to remove from the lane.

      • replaceObstacle

        public void replaceObstacle()
        Create a random time at which to add an Obstacle to the lane.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
